Cerita ini membawakan pelbagai pelakon yang mengerunkan dan padat dengan emosi gerun, dibintangi oleh Datuk Aaron Aziz, Dato Afdlin Shauki, Datin Nina Juren, Adam Corrie dan Mia Sara Shauki. Saksikan Din Tiger dalam membanteras sindiket scam yang berleluasa di sekitar Malaysia ini.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep6
programme.desc: Haridz dikunjungi seorang lelaki misteri. Ganesh tidak tahu tentang kejadian ini, dia sendiri fikir kes ini sudah habis, namun kemudiannya mayat Pokwe ditemui di kawasan kampung.

programme.title: Kuntilanak Ciliwung
programme.desc: Pada suatu hari, Flora yang tertekan kerana ibunya terlalu melindungi, diajak teman lelakinya, Danu, untuk tinggal di rumah kosongnya bersama rakannya Bella dan Marcell. Tetapi pada suatu hari Flora diserang sawan dan mati serta merta selepas api unggun di tepian sungai Ciliwung. Danu dan rakan-rakannya kemudian menanam mayat Flora secara luar biasa. Roh Flora merayau

programme.title: Binhi
programme.desc: Daniel dan Cynthia, pasangan muda dengan anak dalam perjalanan, mengalami masa sukar di Manila. Mereka kembali ke Baguio, tempat asal Daniel, untuk memulakan semula. Melalui kebaikan Alex, kawan Daniel zaman kanak-kanak yang kaya, mereka dapat tinggal di sebuah rumah besar, tanpa sewa; dan dia mendapat tawaran kerja juga. Segala-galanya seolah-olah jatuh pada tempatnya untuk mereka - atau begitulah yang mereka fikirkan - sehingga perkara aneh mula berlaku di rumah mereka.

programme.title: Sebelum Titik Noktah Ep4
programme.desc: Hariz yakin Budi ada kena mengena kerana Budi ada masa dia bertengkar dengan Andy, Hariz tahu Budi adalah peminatnya, mungkin peminat ini bunuh mereka yang cuba sakiti Hariz.

programme.title: Nak Dengar Cerita Hantu Ep7
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki yang menerima patung wayang kulit dari ayahnya kononnya untuk menjaga dia di perantauan. Namun apa yang dia tak tahu patung tersebut mempunyai penjaganya sendiri iaitu hantu pak dogol. Untuk melepaskan diri dari Hantu pak dogol dia harus menjalani beberapa ritual apatah lagi dia melanggar pantang dengan berkahwin dengan gadis yang bukan satu keturunan.

programme.title: Khun Pan 2
programme.desc: Cerita ini mengisahkan tentang seorang pegawai polis bernama Khun Phan dalam Perang Dunia Kedua. Dia menjalankan misi penyamaran untuk menumpaskan seorang gabenor di sebuah pulau yang semua orang di sana dianggap penyamun.

programme.title: Filler
programme.desc: Filler

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Din Tiger
programme.desc: Din Tiger seorang pakar dalam mengendali sindiket jenayah terbesar, kini tumpas di tangan pihak berkuasa. Sekian lama dia ditangkap dan diletakkan dalam penjara, akhirnya dia dilepaskan dan mencari anak yang dah lama melupakan bapa kandungnya. Disebabkan itu, Din terpaksa berhadapan dengan liku-liku hidup. Cerita ini membawakan pelbagai pelakon yang mengerunkan dan padat dengan emosi gerun, dibintangi oleh Datuk Aaron Aziz, Dato Afdlin Shauki, Datin Nina Juren, Adam Corrie dan Mia Sara Shauki. Saksikan Din Tiger dalam membanteras sindiket scam yang berleluasa di sekitar Malaysia ini.

programme.title: Plan B Ep8
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Khai meminjam pistol Mika bagi melepaskan geramnya dengan menembak ke beberapa sasaran di tepi pantai. Dia tertekan dengan bapanya, supaya mendalami ilmu agama dan mengaji Al Quran. Kemudian Khai menemui Iris meluahkan perasaannya untuk menjadikan Iris sebagai kekasihnya, sebagai satu alternatif bagi meringankan bebanan fikirannya. Iris seorang gadis kehilangan ayahnya ketika masih kecil. Jadi dia mencari tempat untuk menumpang kasih. Justeru, jika sekiranya Khai membenci ayahnya, bererti dia tidak berkesempatan untuk menumpang kasih. Kesimpulannya, dia juga tidak akan menerima Khai sebagai kekasih tetapi hanya sebagai kawan sahaja.

programme.title: Howl
programme.desc: Apabila penumpang di dalam kereta api diserang oleh makhluk, mereka mesti bersatu untuk bertahan sehingga pagi.

programme.title: The Night Sitter
programme.desc: Seorang penipu menyamar sebagai pengasuh kanak-kanak untuk merompak rumah seorang ahli ghaib yang kaya dan anak lelakinya yang masih kecil. Tetapi apabila rakan sejenayahnya tiba, budak lelaki itu memanggil trio ahli sihir yang melayan penjahat itu ke malam kekacauan.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Gila - Gila Pengantin
programme.desc: Aliah seorang gadis yang ingin berkahwin tetapi mempunyai satu fobia dimana dia takut untuk bersanding dia atas pelamin setelah apa yang terjadi keatas dirinya semasa dia kecil. Dalam masa yang sama, Johari juga mempunyai masalah yang sama dengan Aliah. Mereka telah bertemu di dalam dunia cyber dan beramah mesra dengan perbualan masing-masing sehingga hari ini. Rupa-rupanya ada kenangan di antara mereka berdua. Namun mereka bakal berkahwin dengan pasangan yang berlainan dari mereka dan kedua-duanya perlu bersanding di atas pelamin ketika majlis perkahwinan.

programme.title: Anak Abah
programme.desc: Zarith yang masih menuntut di luar negara terpaksa pulang ke tanah air untuk menjadi pengerusi dan menguruskan resort peninggalan ayahnya yang meninggal secara tiba-tiba akibat serangan jantung.Farhan yang merupakan salah seorang eksekutif resort tersebut tidak bersetuju di atas perlantikan tersebut kerana usia Zarith yang masih terlalu muda dan kurang pengalaman.Mujur ada Pak Din,pembantu peribadi arwah ayahnya dan Nina, setiausaha ayahnya yang selalu mendorong dan menyokong Zarith.

programme.title: Tuah
programme.desc: Datuk Shaari dan Shahira diselamatkan oleh seorang lelaki yang mendakwa bahawa dirinya Hang Tuah, seorang pahlawan Melayu di abad ke-15. Meragui kisahnya, mereka membawanya melakukan pemeriksaan fizikal dan mental di hospital, lama-kelamaan Shahira mula mempercayainya. Tuah secara ajaibnya telah dibawa ke zaman moden dan mula mempelajari apa yang terjadi pada masa lalu. Akhirnya, Tuah pulang semula ke tempat asalnya dan mula membetulkan keadaan.

programme.title: Bumbung Kiah Lantai Tipah
programme.desc: Nor merupakan seorang pemandu teksi yang sudah berkahwin dua . Rumah isteri pertama dan keduanya hanya dipisahkan oleh satu tingkat namun isteri pertamanya Tipah, tidak tahu bahawa Kiah yang tinggal di atas rumahnya adalah madunya begitu juga Kiah. Mereka yang dahulunya sahabat mula bertengkar setelah mengetahui akan hal tersebut.

programme.title: Kembar Siam
programme.desc: Berwajah serupa namun merupakan dua orang yang berbeza. Dua jejaka dengan kehidupan yang berlainan - seorang ingin menjadi pelakon filem terkenal namun gagal manakala seorang lagi merupakan pelakon filem terkenal namun mengimpikan kebebasan. Mereka bertemu dan merancang sesuatu yang malangnya hanya telah menimbulkan kekacauan dan kekeliruan orang sekeliling.

programme.title: Alahai Manisnya Madu
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Zul yang berkahwin dua dan cuba untuk menyembunyikan perihal tersebut dari pengetahun Zian, isteri pertamanya dan Nani, isteri keduanya. Zul berkahwin dengan kedua-dua wanita tersebut hanya selang seminggu sahaja kerana terpikat dengan kedua dua wanita tersebut dalam masa yang sama.

programme.title: Azura
programme.desc: Seorang jejaka yang berasal daripada keluarga orang berada ingin mengahwini wanita pilihannya, Azura namun ditentang ibu bapanya. Zack mengahwini Azura dan bekerja sebagai buruh untuk menyara keluarganya - ini setelah kewangannya dipotong oleh keluarga. Azura hamil namun dia mula mengesyaki bahawa bayi tersebut bukan miliknya.

programme.title: Satu Impian
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Indra yang berhasrat untuk bekerja di bandar untuk membantu ibunya yang telah tua. Setelah mendapat restu ibunya, Indra mencari pekerjaan di bandar dengan bertemu Dato Karim rakan baik arwah bapanya. Indra diterima bekerja dan diminta untuk tinggal di rumah Dato Karim. Pada mulanya kehadiran Indra tidak disenangi Sandra, anak Dato Karim. Namun hubungan mereka semakin baik selepas Indra menyelamatkan Sandra daripada samseng jalanan. Pada masa yang sama, terdapat satu gerakan yang ingin mensabotaj projek yang sedang diuruskan syarikat Dato Karim.

programme.title: Azura (2012)
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Kau,Aku Dan Dia
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nancy dan Syafiq yang baru tamat pengajian di universiti. Walaupun berlainan bangsa, namun mereka saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Konflik mula berlaku apabila orang tua ingin menjodohkan mereka dengan orang lain. Syafiq kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang gadis buta bernama Mastura yang dilanggarnya secara tidak sengaja. Semakin hari, hubungan antara Syafiq dan Mastura menjadi semakin rapat sehingga Nancy berasa tersisih.

programme.title: XX Ray
programme.desc: Obsesinya terhadap angkasa lepas telah membuatkan Amir untuk mencipta sebuah topi keledar. Topi keledar ini merupakan penemuan baru apabila ia menggunakan kuasa tahi bintang. Sesiapa sahaja yang memakainya boleh melihat menembusi apa sahaja yang mereka inginkan. Kekacauan berlaku apabila topi itu telah menyebabkan Amir bertukar menjadi halimunan.

programme.title: Bila Jodoh
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki bernama Hasrul yang selalu gagal mencari jodoh untuk dirinya. Dengan secara tidak sengaja, dia sering bertemu Liza namun mereka sering bertikam lidah. Dalam masa yang sama, keluarga Hasrul mencari calon untuk dijodohkan dengannya. Tanpa disedari Hasrul, gadis yang ingin dikenalkan kepadanya ialah Liza.

programme.title: XX Ray 2
programme.desc: Bekerja sebagai saintis kadet, Tina berasa ditipu apabila Johan mendakwa dia yang mencipta mesin pelupusan laser walhal ia merupakan hasil cetusan idea dari Tina. Ingin menghalang niat jahat Johan, Tina meminta bantuan Amir. Namun, keduanya terkena pancaran laser mesin itu dalam cubaan untuk menghalang Johan dan telah dihantar ke zaman Kesultanan Melayu Melaka.

programme.title: Jiran
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Ramlan sekeluarga yang baru berpindah di sebuah kawasan perumahan. Namun, Ramlan melarang isteri dan anaknya Tina daripada bergaul dengan jiran-jiran mereka di situ. Ramlan sendiri beranggapan bahawa dengan berlaku sombong terhadap orang, dirinya akan dipandang mulia. Kesombongan Ramlan itu akhirnya menyusahkan dirinya sendiri apabila berlaku satu insiden yang melibatkan kehilangan Tina.

programme.title: Bujang Selamat
programme.desc: Sering diganggu budak-budak di kampung, Bujang mula mempelajari ilmu persilatan. Bujang pergi mendaftarkan diri untuk bertanding di satu pertandingan silat namun telah diperli budak-budak lain. Rasa terhina, Bujang pun pergi bertemu seorang guru silat. Bersama guru itu, Bujang mempelajari teknik bersilat yang sangat hebat.

programme.title: Tembus
programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki bernama Hari yang memegang tanggungjawab besar dalam mengotakan janji agar kehidupan rumahtangganya menjadi semakin baik. Di mata masyarakat, Hari dan isterinya, Izza dianggap sebagai pasangan ideal yang sukses dalam hal rumahtangga dan kerjaya. Namun mereka diuji dengan kehilangan anak dan pelbagai rahsia terbongkar akibat terjadinya peristiwa itu.

programme.title: Azura
programme.desc: Seorang jejaka yang berasal daripada keluarga orang berada ingin mengahwini wanita pilihannya, Azura namun ditentang ibu bapanya. Zack mengahwini Azura dan bekerja sebagai buruh untuk menyara keluarganya - ini setelah kewangannya dipotong oleh keluarga. Azura hamil namun dia mula mengesyaki bahawa bayi tersebut bukan miliknya.

programme.desc: Mengisahkan seorang lelaki bernama Hari yang memegang tanggungjawab besar dalam mengotakan janji agar kehidupan rumahtangganya menjadi semakin baik. Di mata masyarakat, Hari dan isterinya, Izza dianggap sebagai pasangan ideal yang sukses dalam hal rumahtangga dan kerjaya. Namun mereka diuji dengan kehilangan anak dan pelbagai rahsia terbongkar akibat terjadinya peristiwa itu.

programme.title: Azura
programme.desc: Seorang jejaka yang berasal daripada keluarga orang berada ingin mengahwini wanita pilihannya, Azura namun ditentang ibu bapanya. Zack mengahwini Azura dan bekerja sebagai buruh untuk menyara keluarganya - ini setelah kewangannya dipotong oleh keluarga. Azura hamil namun dia mula mengesyaki bahawa bayi tersebut bukan miliknya.

programme.title: Kau,Aku Dan Dia
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Nancy dan Syafiq yang baru tamat pengajian di universiti. Walaupun berlainan bangsa, namun mereka saling mencintai antara satu sama lain. Konflik mula berlaku apabila orang tua ingin menjodohkan mereka dengan orang lain. Syafiq kemudiannya bertemu dengan seorang gadis buta bernama Mastura yang dilanggarnya secara tidak sengaja. Semakin hari, hubungan antara Syafiq dan Mastura menjadi semakin rapat sehingga Nancy berasa tersisih.

programme.title: Azura (2012)
programme.desc: Azura, seorang gadis remaja yang gigih hadapi cabaran hidup untuk mencapai cita-citanya. Dia tinggal bersama ibu saudaranya setelah kedua ibu bapanya meninggal dunia dalam satu tragedi. Azura kemudiannya menjadi mahasiswa di sebuah universiti swasta dan menjalinkan hubungan mesra dengan Zek, seorang anak hartawan. Walau bagaimanapun, cinta mereka dihalang oleh bapa Zek dan mereka terpaksa melalui pelbagai dugaan.

programme.title: Ini Harta Bedu Punya
programme.desc: Bedu,12, mempunyai IQ yang tinggi walaupun dia nampak lurus. Arwah ayah Bedu meletakkan harta semua kepada Bedu manakala separuh harta lagi diserahkan kepada ibunya Thalia. Apabila mengetahui tentang pembahagian harta tersebut, bapa saudaranya, Sadiq mula mengatur perancangan dengan isterinya, Minah untuk dapatkan sebahagian harta itu dengan ingin menjual tanah kebun arwah ayah Bedu.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Din Tiger
programme.desc: Din Tiger seorang pakar dalam mengendali sindiket jenayah terbesar, kini tumpas di tangan pihak berkuasa. Sekian lama dia ditangkap dan diletakkan dalam penjara, akhirnya dia dilepaskan dan mencari anak yang dah lama melupakan bapa kandungnya. Disebabkan itu, Din terpaksa berhadapan dengan liku-liku hidup. Cerita ini membawakan pelbagai pelakon yang mengerunkan dan padat dengan emosi gerun, dibintangi oleh Datuk Aaron Aziz, Dato Afdlin Shauki, Datin Nina Juren, Adam Corrie dan Mia Sara Shauki. Saksikan Din Tiger dalam membanteras sindiket scam yang berleluasa di sekitar Malaysia ini.

programme.title: Mock 2 For 3
programme.desc: Abang dan kakak mencipta model mainan baru dan cuba membentangkan di syarikat komersial, tetapi gagal. Id adalah pengganti syarikat, baru pulang dari Jepun.

programme.title: Tanda - Tanda Kematianku
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Winda yang takut akan tanda-tanda kematian sehingga dia memudaratkan hidupnya sendiri. Ini semua kerana, Winda tidak sedar bahawa kematian itu adalah rahasia Allah yang tidak boleh diramal.

programme.title: Preman Juga Berhak Bahagia
programme.desc: Johan, seorang samseng garang, bertemu semula dengan bekas kekasihnya yang dicabut saku oleh anak buahnya.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S14 Ep10
programme.desc: Anda kaki wayang? Hos Elyssa Alia membawakan anda informasi menarik bagi filem-filem terpilih tempatan dan luar negara dengan cara yang berbeza yang pastinya akan membuat anda ketawa dan santai sambil menonton Jom Wayang

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep8
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: The Real Parakang
programme.desc: Bagas mengamalkan ilmu hitam berbahaya yang dipanggil parakang. Bapa mertuanya, Rusman, menembaknya dalam usaha untuk mengelakkan lebih banyak korban. Pada masa yang sama, Elena, seorang wartawan dengan deria keenam, melihat seorang kanak-kanak mewarisi parakang.

programme.title: Khalifahkah Aku
programme.desc: Kisah Fatah anak kepada Datuk Amran dan Datin Marissa. Kedua-dua ibu bapanya sibuk dengan urusan dunia dan kerap alpa dalam urusan ibadat seharian. Mereka menghantar Fatah belajar di sekolah agama dengan harapan dia menjadi anak yang soleh.

programme.title: Bang Rajan
programme.desc: Terletak betul-betul sebelum kejatuhan ibu kota lama Thailand, Ayuttaya, Bang Rajan menggambarkan lagenda sebuah perkampungan pejuang yang berani menangkis tentera Burma.

programme.title: Tmo Kaki Kitai
programme.desc: Saksikan di sebalik tabir pembikinan Filem Kaki Kitai

programme.title: Surga Mana Yang Kupilih
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Lintang yang terpaksa menunda pernikahannya dengan Hendra kerana tidak tahu siapa sebernanya ibu kandungnya. Adakah ia Niken atau Hasnah?

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Din Tiger
programme.desc: Din Tiger seorang pakar dalam mengendali sindiket jenayah terbesar, kini tumpas di tangan pihak berkuasa. Sekian lama dia ditangkap dan diletakkan dalam penjara, akhirnya dia dilepaskan dan mencari anak yang dah lama melupakan bapa kandungnya. Disebabkan itu, Din terpaksa berhadapan dengan liku-liku hidup. Cerita ini membawakan pelbagai pelakon yang mengerunkan dan padat dengan emosi gerun, dibintangi oleh Datuk Aaron Aziz, Dato Afdlin Shauki, Datin Nina Juren, Adam Corrie dan Mia Sara Shauki. Saksikan Din Tiger dalam membanteras sindiket scam yang berleluasa di sekitar Malaysia ini.

programme.title: Samad Tedung
programme.desc: Samad, digeruni oleh orang kampung kerana sikapnya yang bengis. Oleh itu, dia digelar 'Samad Tedung'. Malah anak-anaknya juga pasti dipukul walaupun hanya melakukan kesilapan yang kecil. Isterinya Rusmila sentiasa bersabar dengan sikapnya walaupun ahli keluarganya sering mendesak supaya dia meninggalkan Samad.

programme.title: Ara
programme.desc: Ara merupakan personaliti TV dibawa kekasihnya Arman bertemu bakal mertuanya, Pn Adibah. Kewujudan anak kecil di rumah Ara membuka peluang kepada Raudah, pembantu peribadi Pn Adibah untuk merampas Arman. Apakah kesudahannya?

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep9
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Nothing Can Stop
programme.desc: Ini adalah kisah dua geng remaja yang kaya, Rama-rama dan Scorpions. Kedua-dua kumpulan saingan itu sentiasa bersaing dalam perlumbaan kereta. Mereka daripada keluarga kaya tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka menyedari bahawa kehidupan di luar rumah mereka tidak selalunya mudah dan penuh dengan kekecewaan.

programme.title: Tayangan Perdana Din Tiger
programme.desc: Din Tiger seorang pakar dalam mengendali sindiket jenayah terbesar, kini tumpas di tangan pihak berkuasa. programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Bayang
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang kehilangan Lisa, seorang penyiasat yang menjadi misteri kerana berkait rapat dengan kes-kes pembunuhan yang sedang disiasatnya bersama seorang rakannya, Azam. Seorang jurugambar amatur bernama Joni, menjadi petunjuk kepada misteri kehilangan Lisa.

programme.title: Time Machine II
programme.desc: Sekumpulan pelajar dari bandar pergi meredah hutan dengan bantuan seorang pemburu muda sebagai pemandu pelancong. Kebakaran hutan memaksa mereka melarikan diri untuk menyelamatkan nyawa mereka. Kumpulan itu sesat dan tersandung ke wilayah Myanmar di tengah-tengah peperangan antara tentera Myanmar dan penyamun hutan.

programme.title: Jangan Disalahkan Takdir
programme.desc: Kisah bermula tentang dua sahabat, Muhammad dan Romi. Seorang bersifat positif, seorang lagi negatif. Mereka sering bertelagah apabila Romi si negatif itu sering menyalahkan orang lain.

programme.title: Variety Jom Wayang S14 Ep11

programme.title: Bob Punya Baby
programme.desc: Seorang lelaki dan seorang wanita masing-masing memalsukan profail mereka dengan menggunakan gambar orang lain dan nama samaran untuk profail facebook mereka

programme.title: Preman Juga Berhak Bahagia

programme.title: Cinta Kucing Parsi
programme.desc: Mengisahkan kehidupan dua sahabat, Alex dan Ikmal yang hidup menganggur. Dek kerana tidak ada kerja, banyak masa dibuang begitu sahaja.

programme.title: Mv Seleksi Sinema Ep3
programme.desc: Seleksi lagu-lagu menarik untuk hiburan anda

programme.title: Berkah Di Akhir Hayat Anakku
programme.desc: Sejak Putri disambar kilat, dia sering melihat perkara ghaib dan boleh melihat sesuatu perkara yang akan terjadi. Bagaimanakah kisah Putri selanjutnya?

programme.title: Mock 2 For 3
programme.desc: Abang dan kakak mencipta model mainan baru dan cuba membentangkan di syarikat komersial, tetapi gagal. Id adalah pengganti syarikat, baru pulang dari Jepun.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep23
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep22
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Tukang Foto Cintanya Jeprat Jepret
programme.desc: Rico didapati curang dengan bekas kekasihnya, dan Mika ingin membatalkan gambar pra-perkahwinannya dengan Rico. Yuda, yang juga merupakan fotografer dan sahabat Rico, diberi tugas untuk merayu Mika.

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. Acara ini berlangsung selama dua malam. Konsert ini adalah paparan hebat bakat Indonesia, dengan persembahan dari pelbagai artis dari pelbagai genre. Acara ini dianjurkan oleh sembilan hos popular dalam industri hiburan Indonesia. Konsert ini bukan sahaja sambutan perjalanan dan pencapaian Indosiar selama hampir tiga dekad, tetapi juga mempamerkan kepelbagaian dan kekayaan budaya Indonesia.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep19
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Ado Gawe Ep23
programme.desc: Program separa dokumentari yang menjemput anda untuk meneroka destinasi unik, menikmati pelbagai masakan dan mengalami budaya yang menarik. Temui tarikan menawan di Palembang, yang dikenali sebagai Venice dari Timur.

programme.title: Bidadari Surgamu Ep127
programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Merajut Gorontalo Ep5
programme.desc: Separa dokumentari yang menerokai tradisi masakan Gorontalo yang pelbagai dan unik. Program ini menampilkan hidangan tradisional, cara penyediaan yang asli, dan budaya masakan tempatan di daerah Gorontalo.

programme.title: Gempita 2024
programme.desc: Gempita 2024: Pesta Tahun Baru yang paling spektakuler dengan pertunjukan bunga api yang mengagumkan di Pantai Carnaval, Ancol. Saksikan persembahan hebat daripada artis-artis terkenal seperti Noah, The Changcuters, Rhoma Irama & Soneta Group, Anna Zanet, dan Jamila. Dihoskan oleh Ben Kasyafani dan Celine Evangelista.

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep19

programme.desc: Pada mulanya, Naya telah melakukan penyelidikan dan latihan praktikal dalam projek Arga. Tetapi lama-kelamaan, Arga telah melamar Naya.

programme.desc: Menceritakan kisah seorang gadis bernama Sakinah yang menjalani kehidupan penuh tekanan akibat fitnah dan dipaksa untuk berkahwin dengan seseorang yang tidak mencintainya. Tidak hanya itu, Sakinah juga dihalang untuk mengetahui siapa ibu kandungnya yang tega membuangnya.

programme.title: Doyan Makan Ep25
programme.desc: Doyan Makan menjemput penonton untuk mengikuti perjalanan dan pengalaman kulinari untuk makanan popular di kawasan tersebut, serta akan meninjau informasi tentang tempat, harga dan proses penghasilan makanan yang mereka nikmati.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 3 Ep5
programme.desc: Qari Cilik Indonesia kembali untuk musim ketiga, menampilkan kanak-kanak berbakat dalam seni tilawah Al-Quran. Saksikan perjalanan para peserta muda dalam menyampaikan bacaan yang indah dan penuh makna.

programme.title: Getuk Dangdut Pembawa Asmara Gak Rugi Doong
programme.desc: Kiara melarikan diri dari rumah kerana marah dan merasa malu mempunyai makcik, Ghita, yang menjual getuk. Ketika Ghita mencari Kiara, dia mendapat bantuan daripada Yudi, seorang guru kacak yang mengajar di sekolah Kiara.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 2024 Ep12
programme.desc: Karnaval SCTV merupakan sebuah rancangan varieti yang disiarkan di SCTV dan datang ke bandar anda. Ia dimeriahkan oleh para pelakon sinetron SCTV serta pemuzik tanah air. Karnaval SCTV kali ini hadir di Madiun dengan tetamu istimewa yang mengejutkan

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta S2 Ep21
programme.desc: Starla menyangka dia telah menghadapi segalanya, tetapi penipuan Niko jauh lebih mendalam daripada yang disangkanya. Ketika dia terus berusaha mempertahankan perkahwinannya, ancaman baharu muncul. Ayu, yang masih taksub dengan Niko, semakin mengikatnya dalam perangkap dengan menggunakan anak mereka yang belum lahir sebagai umpan. Pada masa yang sama, naluri Starla merasakan ada sesuatu yang tidak kena, dan dia mula diburu oleh bayang-bayang serta rahsia gelap. Dengan keluarganya di ambang bahaya dan emosinya semakin tertekan, adakah Starla mampu melindungi orang-orang tersayang? Atau adakah pengkhianatan Niko akan mendorongnya melangkaui batas yang tidakbolehkembali?

programme.title: Qari Cilik Season 3 Ep6
programme.desc: Qari Cilik Indonesia kembali untuk musim ketiga, menampilkan kanak-kanak berbakat dalam seni tilawah Al-Quran. Saksikan perjalanan para peserta muda dalam menyampaikan bacaan yang indah dan penuh makna.

programme.title: Le Grand Chef

programme.title: Travel With The Royal Family Ep1
programme.desc: Reunited for the first time in thirteen years were Ada Choi, Tao Xin-ran, Xi Lan, Zhang Xiao-long, Lan Ying-ying, Chen Si-si, and Yang Jiu-lang. Beginning from Daguanyuan in Beijing, the filming location of the top-leading drama "Empresses in the Palace", they traveled to various ethnic cultural origins. Through in-depth exploration and study, they experienced the local customs and culture, carrying with them both nostalgic memories and new aspirations, completing their "Rejuvenation Journey" across China.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep203
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is cohosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Pro on their Speciality T Ep1030
programme.desc: A popular educational documentary programs that record and reports all sorts of business stories all over the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep204
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and FiveStar Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa T Ep256
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life.This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easytounderstand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Hot Door Night M Ep2286
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in crosstalk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: 100 Wife T Ep205
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. JinKe meiman has two sons, YouTsai and YouDe. YouTsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife SiouYing to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although SiouYing was betrayed by YouTsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her motherinlaw, and has singlemindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan T Ep5028
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: My Kickass Wife
programme.desc: Jade is a beautiful royal guard who is set up for marriage by the Queen in order to avoid the King setting eyes on her. Jade falls for Sean and helps him win the contest for her. After the wedding, Sean discovers her bad temper and visits a brothel in his despair. He meets and is attracted to a girl there, not knowing she has a secret agenda...

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: Find Your Voice
programme.desc: The passion choir pilot program trains students from three underperforming schools choir to participate in an inter-school choral competition. While it seems impossible, a renowned conductor, Yim Tsz Long, unexpectedly agrees to lead the choir. Will the passion choir and Maestro Yim complete this impossible mission and win the competition?

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Changs first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunts puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: A series of bomb explosions is causing fear in Hong Kong. Former bomb specialist Feng is found in coma at the crime scene and becomes a suspect. To prove his innocence, he seeks help from his former partner Wen. However, it seems revealing the truth is as risky as disposing a bomb

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the homes wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect partners, Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: Princess and 7 Kung Fu Masters
programme.desc: Seven Kung Fu masters live in Lucky Town, the only safe residing place in northeast China. When warlord Lam refuses to side with the Japanese, an agent is assigned to take over his army and kill his daughter using ninjutsu. Lams daughter escapes and seeks help from the seven masters, who finally defeat the enemy and save the warlord!

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: A drug cartel is entrenched in the Dong Zhou area. Mei Jing of the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit, leads her team to attack the drug base, but they are being ambushed and the identity of Meis father as an undercover is exposed. After a fierce battle, Mei and her team manage to successfully defeat the drug cartel and rescue her father.

programme.title: Infernal Affairs III
programme.desc: Ming is transferred to do menial police work ten months after the murder of Yan, in 2004. Meanwhile, a new star, Wing, has emerged in the police force and Ming suspects he is also a mole sent by the triad. Determined to start anew, Ming must kill Wing while ensuring his own identity does not get exposed.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: Chasing the Dragon (2020)
programme.desc: In 1960s Hong Kong, rookie cop Xu Le cracks a robbery but gets demoted instead, as this offends a corrupt inspector. Xu meets a rich girl Bai who falls instantly in love with him one day. Will he break up with his childhood girlfriend for Bai so as to climb the social ladder, and how does Xu eventually become one of Hong Kongs legendary detective?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: WE12
programme.desc: An underground organization, The League of Kaito has been maintaining international order. While 12 elite members possess extraordinary skills and have worked independently for a period of time, they must rekindle their long-lost team spirit to accomplish a mission together to save the world from disaster.

programme.title: The Wandering Earth II
programme.desc: In this prequel, humans build enormous engines on the Earths surface to find a new home when the sun is burning out. In the dangerous universe, a group of young people has to step forward once again to fight in the critical battle to save the Earth.

programme.title: The Grandmaster
programme.desc: Directed by the acclaimed filmmaker Wong Kar Wai, this epic action feature begins in Foshan when Ip Man, the martial arts master from the south, takes up a challenge by ageing northern master Gong Yu Tian. Ip Man wins the fight, but is then defeated by Gong Yu Tians daughter Gong Er, with whom he forms an emotional bond

programme.title: Dust to Dust
programme.desc: Back in 1995, the Police successfully arrested five armed bank robbers while the two masterminds got tipped off and made a clean escape. Decades later, retired cop Wang Shou Yue is drawn back to the unsolved case when he sees a blurred figure in a news clip. A battle between good and evil has just begun!

programme.title: YUM Investigation
programme.desc: YUM is a detective agency that handles supernatural cases. As YUM investigates the evil spirits appearing in an old building, they discover that the spirits are created by a spirit master to haunt the residents so that the building can be vacated for redevelopment. Can the YUM investigators finally find ways to fight against the master?

programme.title: Shadows
programme.desc: Ching is a forensic psychiatrist who has the power to enter a persons subconscious mind. In her latest case, she suspects that another psychiatrist is responsible for a brutal murder-cum-suicide case involving a social worker. In the investigation process, Ching finds herself under suspicion instead, as she comes face-to-face with a past trauma

programme.title: The Eagle Shooting Heroes
programme.desc: Executive produced by Wong Kar Wai, The Eagle Shooting Heroes is loosely based on Louis Chas classics. Whilst mistaken identity and rampant gender confusion are on the menu, Sammo Hungs action direction and the incredible all-star casts also keep the laughs and thrills coming in this Hong Kong-style crazy comedy.

programme.title: The Mermaid
programme.desc: A real estate tycoon plans to turn a marine protected area into a new property development, thereby destroying the secret habitat of the mermaids. A beautiful mermaid, Shan, is tasked to seduce the tycoon and stop the destruction. However, when Shans mission fails, a final, fatal war between humans and mermaids becomes inevitable.

programme.title: From Vegas to Macau III
programme.desc: Ken holds a wedding ceremony in Macau for his daughter Rainbow. However, an explosion during the wedding causes Rainbow to fall into coma, while Ken and his friend Mark, are accused of engulfing some illicit money. Enraged, Ken swears to seek vengeance and pursue the mastermind who has gotten them involved in his evil plan.

programme.title: The Locksmith
programme.desc: Locksmith Master Shan suffers from dementia and passes on his skills to Hao Ren, who surpasses him. Detective Liu often seeks Hao Ren's help and they become good friends. When Hao Ren reunites with an old friend one day, he accidentally unfolds the truth behind Shan's wife's disappearance, leading to a chain of mysterious events.

programme.title: Vanguard
programme.desc: A businessman Qin Guo Li is being kidnapped in London and his daughter is also in danger. The international security team, Vanguard, is hired to rescue them. Tang Huan Ting, the founder, gathers an elite team to track them down across countries, from London to Africa and Dubai. In the process, they also discover another dangerous conspiracy.

programme.title: Another Me
programme.desc: Constable Li Mao marries a rich girl but her parents disapprove of their marriage. One day, Li accidentally discovers that he looks exactly like the prince! While he aims to secure a high ranking position in the palace, the prince wants freedom, so they decide to switch identities. This however, got them both involved in the ministers conspiracy

programme.title: The Way We Are
programme.desc: Set in Tin Shui Wai, a marginalised satellite town, Kwai is a middle-aged widow who works hard in a neighbourhood supermarket to support herself and her son. They lead a mundane but fulfilling life. When an elderly woman who lives alone moved in to Tin Shui Wai, Kwai strikes up a friendship with her and helps her ease into a new life.

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: VR Fighter
programme.desc: Bodyguard Long Wei has posttraumatic stress disorder after his wife's death. One day, he encounters Amy who works for a VR technology firm and is invited for a new product test. After the test, Long Wei becomes the firms VR fighter and dons the newly invented armour. However, as mysterious armed men break in, a fierce battle has just begun...

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: The Pirate
programme.desc: Pirate Chang Pao Chai discovers a leak in his ship after a successful raid on a foreign merchant ship. He goes ashore to get materials to patch up his ship, but encounters corrupt Qing officials oppressing the poor peasants. A good man at heart, he decides to help the peasants and gain a reputation of being a great pirate in the process.

programme.title: Lovers Blades
programme.desc: The Lovers Blades, a pair of invincible weapons, are to be delivered to the Qing Emperor. However, they accidentally fell into the hands of Xiao Zhong Hui and Yuan Guan Nan, so Imperial Chief Zhuo Tian Xiong hunts them down for the blades. As the battle begins, the secret of the blades are also revealed.

programme.title: Cat VS Rat
programme.desc: Zhan and Bai are equally matched in martial arts skills. Bai saves the Emperor one day but did not believe in his identity and rejects a promotion. When Zhan is promoted to the royal guard after saving the Emperor, Bai gets angry and tries to prank him by stealing the imperial jade seal. Luckily, Zhan is able to retrieve the seal with his skills.

programme.title: The Magnificent Concubine
programme.desc: Yang Gui Fei is the beloved concubine of Emperor Tang Ming Huang, who is so besotted with her that he leaves the running of the country to Prime Minister Yang Guo Zhong, the brother of Yang Gui Fei. The Prime Minister is corrupt and cruel to the army, causing them to revolt and endanger the throne. Yang Gui Fei is also implicated and kills herself.

programme.title: To Kill a Jaguar
programme.desc: Set in 1920s Shanghai, a village girl journeys to the big city in search of her father and meets her childhood friend Jaguar, who works for the mob boss Kam. In a world controlled by the mobs, it is a test of survival for all as Jaguar allies himself with ace gunman Ko Tang, to take over Kams empire.

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his fathers deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: The Devil's Mirror
programme.desc: A power-hungry Witch who leads the Bloody Ghouls Clan, seeks two magical mirrors, Wind Mirror and Thunder Mirror, which are owned by Bai and the Wen Clan respectively. She needs both mirrors to find the location of a powerful weapon that will make her invincible and will stop at nothing to get her hands on them.

programme.title: The Gambling Syndicate
programme.desc: A young provincial detective seeks to take down a local gambling syndicate with the help of two convicts.

programme.title: Puppy Love
programme.desc: To the tune of the Osmonds hit song, this is a story of adolescent playfulness & innocence lost. Two best friends grow up together and teasingly meet two delightfully impish boys leading to the four to flirtatiously intermingle. However, the innocence of partner swapping eventually leads to a roller-coaster bouts of misunderstood emotions.

programme.title: Raw Passions
programme.desc: Mrs Lin's husband and his friend both have affairs with a belly dancer Sasa, and are both blackmailed by her. Sasa is stabbed one day and her brother shows up asking for money. A mysterious man also claims he can offer evidence for cash to help Lins husband. Lin has to unveil the deceit, double-crosses and blackmailing before she is in danger too!

programme.title: Mr. Funnybone Strikes Again
programme.desc: In this hilarious sequel, Mr Big Potato opens an old-fashioned Chinese clinic, but his traditional methods are rejected by the sceptics of modern Hong Kong. Enter his buddy Mr Funny bone to rescue his business!

programme.title: The Lady is the Boss
programme.desc: Wong Hsia Yuan is a traditional kung fu master whose academy is on the brink of closure. Chan Mei Ling arrives from U.S. to revitalize the academy but her way of recruiting students is going beyond questionably legal. Yuan is furious, but when the local triads enter the picture, Yuan and Ling join hands to take back the neighborhood.

programme.title: Two Champions of Shaolin
programme.desc: Set in the Qing Dynasty, the Shaolin clan wants to overthrow Qing and restore the Ming Dynasty, while the Wudang clan is backed by the Qing government. The two renowned clans eventually set themselves up against each other, and a series of vicious fighting has just begun

programme.title: The Spirit of the Sword
programme.desc: Water Clan Chief is severely wounded by a samurai killer shortly before the annual duel at Tai Lake. He sends his brother Bao Yu on a long journey to find an antidote for him. On the way, Bao Yu encounters Little Princess and falls in love with her, not knowing that she is hiding a secret plot

programme.title: Golden Swallow
programme.desc: A heroine finds herself in a love triangle with a swordsman and a warrior. They team up to conquer the evil forces of the martial arts world but she is unable to choose between both men even as they face a deadly duel.

programme.title: The Kingdom and the Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Cheng Te meets country maiden Li Feng on a visit to Southern China. It was love at first sight and the Emperor leaves with a promise that Li Feng would be his empress. When he sends for Li one year later, she was too ill to withstand the arduous journey and arrives just in time to die in the arms of her beloved...

programme.title: West Chamber
programme.desc: The story is based on a famous Chinese opera. A young impoverished scholar, Zhang, is enchanted by Hong, the daughter of an influential family whom he meets in a temple. The young couple faces the threat of separation due to her familys objection, so Hongs maid secretly helps to arrange their rendezvous in the West Chamber!

programme.title: A Deadly Secret
programme.desc: A corrupt magistrate, obsessed with finding a hidden treasure, jails and tortures his daughter's lover and buries his daughter alive! Ironically, it is in her coffin that the secret to the hidden treasure is found, setting off a frenzy of destruction.

programme.title: The Emperor and his Brother
programme.desc: The Emperor Qianlong is not the legitimate successor to the throne at birth, but he only learns the truth when two senior members of a subversive anti-government secret organisation contact him years later. As it happens, the chef of this organisation is Qianlongs younger brother and they must now confront each other in opposing roles

programme.title: Heads For Sale
programme.desc: Hua is an upright and brave swordswoman who will stand up against villains and do anything for Luo, the man she loves. When Luo is sent to jail by the corrupted police, she sets out to free him and did not hesitate to chop off two bodyguards heads. In the process, she also stumbles across an old enemy of her father who is back seeking revenge.

programme.title: The Daredevils
programme.desc: Corrupt general Wang Li assumes power by killing his superior. The son of the murdered superior befriends four street performers called The Venoms, and they help him take revenge by posing as government officials offering a peace token to the corrupt general. When Wang arrives at a warehouse, he is ambushed by the Venoms!

programme.title: Black Magic 2
programme.desc: Doctor Sing is puzzled by the strange symptoms of his patients and asks his friend for help. The sickness is apparently caused by a black magic that is casted by a wicked man Kong. Kong covets the beauty of Sings wife and casts an evil love spell on her, while threatening to kill Sing at the same time. Can Sing save his wife and his patients?

programme.title: Ode to Gallantry
programme.desc: In this surprisingly light-hearted "Venoms" martial arts adventure, a lone wanderer is repeatedly mistaken for someone else and drawn into a number of violent battles.

programme.title: The Happiest Moment
programme.desc: This erotic comedy anthology features three stories about an old man who dies from an overdose of virility pills, a cop who goes on the run after extorting money from a hooker, and a barber's apprentice who encounters a lively corpse in a night vigil. Through playing all these characters, Michael Hui proves himself as a genius of Hong Kong comedy.

programme.title: The Lizard
programme.desc: A seasoned burglar 'The Lizard' sets himself up against a corrupt police chief and announced that he will steal a diamond from a rich mans party. His real identity, which is discovered by the corrupt police chiefs granddaughter, is actually a young policeman who is doing it all for justice.

programme.title: A Friend from Inner Space
programme.desc: A young boy whose parents are separated tries to find happiness in life. One day, he meets and befriends a kind-hearted spirit Ren, who decides to make him truly happy by getting his parents back together.

programme.title: Shaolin Rescuers
programme.desc: Hong Xi Guan of Shaolin is chased and wounded by a martial arts scum who took refuge in the Qing court. He is saved and healed by friends from the wet market and they hide Hong in a bean curd shop to protect him. However, Hongs enemy finds him and ambushes him at the shop, hoping to capture Hong and all his friends.

programme.title: The Savage Five
programme.desc: A group of bandits flees with a stolen safe to a village where they oppress the villagers and force the blacksmith Wei to unlock the safe. Wei refuses and flees to report to officials, while heroes of the town emerge to fight the bandits.

programme.title: The Proud Twins
programme.desc: Jiang Xiao Yu is separated from his twin brother as a baby after his parents are murdered. He is taken by a couple to Villains Valley and raised to be a villain by a host of outlaws. Jiang leaves the valley to explore the world when he grows up. Will he be able to avenge his parents and meet with his twin brother?

programme.title: Return to the 36th Chamber
programme.desc: The second film of the trilogy, Gordon Liu plays Zhou Ren Jie, a man who impersonates a monk in order to learn kung fu in Shaolin, and eventually creates his own Shaolin style of scaffolding kung fu.

programme.title: The Human Goddess
programme.desc: This is a love story between an alluring fairy, Seventh Sister, who comes down from heaven to experience life in 70s Hong Kong, and a man who is running a debt laden orphanage. A heartless tycoon plans to take over the orphanage for its land but has to deal with Seventh Sisters magical powers as she aims to protect it from falling into his hands!

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but he forgives Qi after knowing Qis guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Brothers Five
programme.desc: The five Kao brothers, separated since birth, are unaware that the master of Teng Lung Manor has killed their father. All five however, vow to defeat the vicious gangsters at the manor due to their bullying ways. After reuniting and with much discipline and hard work, the Kaos are prepared to face Lung and his gang.

programme.title: The Weird Man
programme.desc: During the Three Kingdoms period, a Taoist priest Yu Ji cures many patients with his supernatural powers and is loved by the people. However, the arrogant general Sun Che thinks that Yu Ji bewitches people and orders for him to be beheaded. Subsequently, the spirit of the Yu Ji rises from his dead body and takes revenge on Sun Che.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep106
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Tarak Mehta Ka Chhota Chasma Ep107
programme.desc: The residents of Gokuldham Society encounter several adventures and misadventures as they navigate the ups and downs of life and overcome their struggles together in this animated series.

programme.title: Sudha Murtyâ€™s Stories Of Wit And Magic Ep11
programme.desc: A compilation of fictional stories that help to inculcate good values in children while simultaneously teaching them important life lessons.

programme.title: Oh My Lallan Ep42
programme.desc: Lallan-a stray dog who lives around a house with 4 other Pets & sneaks into the house for food, water & shelter.The 4 pets' sole mission is to keep this stray dog away from them and the family

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep3
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep4
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Kicko & Super Speedo Ep5
programme.desc: A superhero child and his special car, Super Speedo, go on adventiures to save the world from villains.

programme.title: Honey Bunny And The Superace Car Ep1
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep3
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Sab Jholmaal Hai Ep4
programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar.

programme.title: Paap O Meter Ep21

programme.title: Sucker Punch
programme.desc: Close your eyes. Open your mind. You will be unprepared. From the Spartan slaughter of 300 to the visionary world of Watchmen, writer/director/producer Zack Snyder has transported audiences into visual dreamscapes of his creation. His latest cinematic mind trip takes us into the vivid imagination of a young girl (The Uninvited's Emily Browning) whose dream world provides the ultimate escape from her darker institutionalized reality. Unrestrained by the boundaries of time and place, she is free to go where her mind takes her, but her incredible adventures blur the lines between what's real and what is imaginary. Locked away against her will, but determined to fight for her freedom, she and four other girls battle everything from serpents tosamurais on an unbelievable journey to set themselves free. Like "Alice in Wonderland with machine guns," Snyder's epic action fantasy is filmed in such a way that the action sequences aren't limited by physical real...

programme.title: Charlie's Angels
programme.desc: With the worlds smartest, bravest, and most highly trained women all over the globe, there are now teams of Angels guided by multiple Bosleys taking on the toughest jobs everywhere.

programme.title: Tarzan

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: Oscar winner Peter Jackson directs Naomi Watts, Jack Black and Adrien Brody in this cinematic vision filled with non-stop action, terrifying creatures and groundbreaking special effects.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Hastings - Kate follows the historic East Sussex coastline, beginning on the cliffs overlooking Hastings, a town associated with the Battle of 1066.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Beneath the Waves - Asia has the longest coastline of any continent and the earth's richest coral reefs. This episode explores Asia's waters, as spectacular as they are diverse, and never-seen-before animal behaviour.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Above the Clouds - Asia is the most mountainous continent on earth. From the tropical south to its barren centre, its highest places are home to some of our planet's most remarkable wildlife.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Frozen North - In the remote reaches of Asia's frozen north, creatures must overcome unique challenges, finding exceptional ways to thrive in a hostile world that pushes life to its very limits.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tangled Worlds - Asia's jungles are beautiful and exceptionally diverse, but whilst they provide shelter, food and opportunity, they are also full of dangers and hidden threats.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Crowded Continent - In the planet's most densely populated continent, animals live at extremely close quarters with people, from tigers making a home in town to elephants stopping traffic for food.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Arid Heart - In the heart of Asia lie vast arid lands. These deserts and dry grasslands are so hostile, they push life to the limit. The animals that live here are some of the earth's toughest.

programme.title: Asia S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Saving Asia - Many passionate people are dedicated to saving the wild animals of Asia. These individuals and their ingenious solutions give us hope and optimism for the future of the continent.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. Naturalists, guides, vets and conservationists in Kenya and back in the UK offer a unique perspective on the life of these lions.

programme.title: The Last Overland S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Royals and Rebels - Alex and Nat meet a new guide, Sithu. Heading north, the team are trying to follow Tim's old road to India's notorious "Wild West", but Sithu warns of an escalating civil war on the road ahead.

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep9
programme.desc: Ireland - On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europe's rugged western frontier.

programme.desc: Texas - This week Robson is in Texas, the Lone Star State. Starting on the Trinity River, Robson is chasing a monster: the Alligator Gar.

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote northern bush Simon heads out on patrol with a unique military unit who use ancient aboriginal knowledge.

programme.title: Dynasties S2 Ep1
programme.desc: A young meerkat queen must unite her family if her pups are to survive in a harsh land

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Mist swirls around the base of Shanghai's skyline. From the city, tigers and monkeys seem as unreal and distant as dragons and mermaids emerging through the mist. Yet they exist as rare survivors in an extraordinary and diverse landscape. From snow leopards to wild horses, and from alligators to elephants, China's iconic wildlife is a lot more than just pandas.

programme.title: Levison Wood: Walking With... S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Polar Bears - Levison travels deep into the vast arctic wilderness of east Greenland to track down some of the most elusive populations of polar bears on the planet. But will he get up close and personal with one?

programme.title: Where the Wild Men Are with Ben Fogle S10 Ep9
programme.desc: Ireland - On Great Blasket Island, off the coast of Ireland, Ben stays with London couple Dan and Emily, who landed an extraordinary job as island caretakers on Europe's rugged western frontier.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep6
programme.desc: USA East - This week Robson's fishing challenge takes him to New York where his opponent is known as the Tony Soprano of fishing.

programme.title: Rare Survivors - China's Iconic Wildlife S1 Ep1

programme.title: Australia with Simon Reeve S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In the remote northern bush Simon heads out on patrol with a unique military unit who use ancient aboriginal knowledge.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Peru - Robson's next stop is Peru, where he will fish the world's largest river, its largest ocean, and one of its highest mountain ranges.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep9
programme.desc: Shola Ameobi - Robson takes former Newcastle striker Shola Ameobi for a day out. After wing foiling, they join an outdoor ballet class, and Robson takes a wildlife photography lesson.

programme.title: Robson Green's Weekend Escapes S2 Ep10
programme.desc: The Green Sisters - Robson's sisters Dawn and Joanna join the actor on a weekend of activities in Northumberland. A sidecar motorbike drive is only topped by a puffin cruise from Amble Harbour.

programme.title: Engineering Repurposed S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Get on board with a cool use for a Boeing 747's wings, which are now the roof of a California house, and step inside a theatre that rose like a phoenix from Industrial Revolution ashes.

programme.title: Robson Green's Extreme Fishing Challenge S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Peru - Robson's next stop is Peru, where he will fish the world's largest river, its largest ocean, and one of its highest mountain ranges.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bees Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - The Fickle River Ep1
programme.desc: Travel to Samburu, where matriarch Anastasia turns her elephant herd north after a local river dries up. Then, in Naboisho, see cheetah mom Kuleta evade a crafty pack of hyenas. Later, in Laikipia, check in on wild dog Phoenix and her new litter.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Land of Gremlins 1 - Lemur Spirit Ep1
programme.desc: This is the story of a day in the life of an Indris Family following a mother, father, and their three offspring around their home in the rainforest of Mantadia National Park in Madagascar.

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 - Tidelands Ep4
programme.desc: Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Loka the Baby Elephant Ep2
programme.desc: Every year, the biggest elephant congregation in Asia occurs in Minneriya National Park. Here in this sacred place, baby Loka is born. Watch as he learns to suckle, swim and handle his trunk among the mle of giants that make up his family.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Island of the Monsoon 1 - Loka the Baby Elephant Ep2

programme.title: Guardians of the Wild 3 - Carnivore Rescue Ep2
programme.desc: Deep in Kafue National Park, the largest and wildest protected area in Zambia, a team of biologists and vets from the Zambian Carnivore Programme (ZCP) races against time to save and protect Africas apex predators.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Scent Detectives Ep5
programme.desc: A Labrador cross and its partner help prevent ecological disaster in Canada, a Lagotto Romagnolo unearths a rare delicacy in Washington forests, and a Belgian malinois team tracks down the critically endangered geometric tortoise to save the species.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Episode 7 - Follow along as the wildlife rehab team works to treat a baby raccoon, separated from his family, and get him back in the wild before his parents move on. In another part of the centre, watch as an orphaned killdeer is introduced to...himself?

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return To The Wild - Nature is under pressure and South Africa is paying the price. But with new investment in ecotourism, populations of animals are rebounding and many species are being reintroduced. Witness one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Surviving The Amazon S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Jungle Killers - A jaguar stalks the riverbank. A venomous snake is on the move. A Colombian tarantula waits for night fall. Watch as these fierce predators prowl through the jungle and bite into their next great meal.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion In The Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica: Sky to Sea - Visit the Monteverde cloud forest, where swirling mists feed Costa Ricas mighty rivers and create a haven for biodiversity. See some of its 750 tree species, hang out with sloths and monkeys, and watch nature heal after decades of deforestation.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earth - Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Linear Oasis - The 1,200 mile Orange River is the longest in South Africa. Follow its westward journey, and see a diverse sample of wildlife from powerful swimming birds like the African darter, to flat lizards who inhabit the granite rocks of the Augrabies Falls.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Australia - Its a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the largest sand island on earth, and home to wild dingoes, six-foot sand-worms, and eucalyptus woodlands. Find out how everything lives happily together in a complex ecosystem built entirely upon sand.

programme.title: Africa's Wild Horizons S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Return To The Wild - Nature is under pressure and South Africa is paying the price. But with new investment in ecotourism, populations of animals are rebounding and many species are being reintroduced. Witness one of the most exciting conservation success stories in Africa.

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Realm of the Bear - Explore the primeval forests where a Eurasian brown bear struggles to find enough food for her cubs and lynx kittens learn to hunt, while local beekeepers try to protect their honey for their livelihoods. Learn how the predators and humans coexist.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Episode 8 - Join the rescue team as they respond to a call about an opossum stuck in a fence that turns out not to be the kind of animal that plays dead. Inside the centre, a goose with a serious foot injury receives physiotherapy before returning to the wild.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Costa Rica: Sky to Sea - Visit the Monteverde cloud forest, where swirling mists feed Costa Ricas mighty rivers and create a haven for biodiversity. See some of its 750 tree species, hang out with sloths and monkeys, and watch nature heal after decades of deforestation.

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Duckling Dramas - Deal with duelling duckling roundups and find out if vet Karina calls in specialists to treat koala Spikes leg fracture. Get to the bottom of stomach issues plaguing baby echidnas Ping and Pong, and meet koala Jarrah, who seems to have lost his way.

programme.title: Wildlife ER S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Into the Sunset - Contend with a flood of abandoned koala joeys, then join vet nurse Nick on a hunt for natural remedies to treat a wallabys gut ailment. Ponder options for a baby bat stuck in a tree and look on as vet Karina operates on a barn owls fractured wing.

programme.title: Animals At Play S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Discover how recreation is more widespread across species than scientists thought. See predators get a mental workout as well as a physical one, and witness one of the first recorded examples of reptile play.

programme.title: The Living Beach S1 Ep6
programme.desc: California - The drought is driving Mule Deer out of their habitats. The warming ocean is sending Sea Lions in another direction. The Pelicans are trying to survive coastal oil spills. What will become of the beautiful beaches of California?

programme.title: Carpathian Predators S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Realm of the Wolf - Follow a Eurasian wolf packs struggle to raise its pups amid all the challenges cooler weather brings. Deep in the forest, see stags vie for the right to mate and fire salamanders search for a place to hibernate for winter as predators loom.

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: Christmas Specials 2021 S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Great New Year Bake Off - Paul Hollywood, Prue Leith, Matt Lucas and Noel Fielding see in the New Year with 2018 Bake Off runner-up Kim-Joy and fellow baker Jon and Hermine and Rowan from the 2020 Bake Off bubble.

programme.title: My Unique B&B S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Becky and David's Yurt - Simon and the team meet semi-retired couple Becky and David to help them convert their drab old yurt into an a colourful and inviting bijou B&B.

programme.title: Junior Bake Off S8 Ep12
programme.desc: Finals week continues and the theme is street food. The technical is a naan shawarma while for a showstopper they have to supersize a bagel.

programme.title: Jason Atherton's Dubai Dishes S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Spices - Jason's debut in Dubai is all things spice as he explores a traditional souk in the old town, shows us how to spice up our lives, and is joined by local chef Rahul Rana.

programme.title: Nadiya's Party Feasts S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Nadiya Hussain shares her favourite party dishes. She joins a group of children as they make cupcakes, lends a hand with a trifle and helps out with a birthday cake.

programme.title: Cook Clever, Waste Less With Prue & Rupy S1 Ep2
programme.desc: The Webster-Holmes Family - Danielle wants to cook nutritious meals for her two girls but often resorts to takeaways and frozen food, leading to waste. Will she like Prue and Rupy's meal plan that gets her batch-cooking?

programme.title: Jamie's 5 Ingredient Mediterranean Meals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: In this episode Jamie's got recipes that make a hero of the freezer and store cupboard: using frozen fish to save on time, money and planning; making a super-speedy snack that gives frozen veggies their place in the sun; and two hearty dishes that elevate store-cupboard staples to the next level. And he's called on his mentor and all-round Italian legend, Gennaro Contaldo, to rustle up some delicious homemade gnocchi using just 5 easy ingredients.

programme.title: The Graham Norton Show: New Year's Eve Special 2023
programme.desc: In his traditional much-loved New Year's Eve show, Graham takes a look back at some of the most memorable stories, people and events of 2023, with the help of a glittering sofa of guests: Hollywood stars Emma Stone and Mark Ruffalo, "Strictly" and "The Traitors" host Claudia Winkleman, and comedy legend Rob Brydon.

programme.title: Grand Designs S20 Ep5
programme.desc: In Derbyshire, Mike and Sarah set out to build a multigenerational longhouse. But with a complicated roof, a shortage of materials and an unexpected bereavement, it proves far from easy...

programme.title: Rick Stein's Taste of Shanghai

programme.title: MTV Unplugged: Elton John
